article: Hi, boys and girls! Do you know  _  the house will be like in the future? Let's listen to a prediction from a  _  He says there will be  _  houses in the future. The houses  look like  trees. The surface of the house is like a leaf. When the sun  _  , it can get sunlight . The sunlight can keep the house  _  . And it can help to make fresh  _  for the house too. The bottom of the house is 8  _  the land. It can  _  the soil to keep the house strong. People won't be afraid of the strong wind. Can this man's prediction  come true  ? No one knows.
